#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
//#include<conio.h>
typedef unsigned long long int64;
void ustrrev(char *a){int i,j=strlen(a);for(i=0;i<j/2;i++){char ch=a[i];a[i]=a[j-1-i];a[j-1-i]=ch;}}
int64 gcd(int64 a,int64 b){int64 t; if(a<b){t=b;b=a;a=t;} t=b;while(a%b){t=a%b;a=b;b=t;}return t;}
int main()
{
    int t;
     char a[]="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
   ustrrev(a);
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t)
    {
            t--;
   int n;
   char b[150];
   b[0]='\0';
   scanf("%d",&n);
   int i=n%25;
   char c[260];
   int j=0;
   if(i)
   for(i=25-i;i<strlen(a);i++)
 {  c[j++]=a[i];//printf("%d %c\n",i,a[i]);
 }
 c[j]='\0';
 //puts(c);
 int k=n/25;
 for(k-1;k>0;k--)
 strcat(b,a);
 //puts(b);
 strcat(c,b);
 puts(c);
   
  // puts(c);
}
   
   
  
  
  // getch();
}
